articles.title: Supreme Court Restrains Centre, Navy From Releasing Officers From Service
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Monday restrained the Centre and Navy from releasing from services some officers (both male and female), who were not granted a permanent commission and sought reply from the Centre.
articles.content:
